t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - From a campaign management perspective, by automating the traditional 70-step campaign creation process, Brand+ and Performance+ reduce complexity and provide real-time reporting and AI-driven optimizations, enabling brands to stay competitive and drive better business results.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Amazon Brand Registry Spain: Protect and build your brand
s: Start your brand’s Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.
